tuv.seg: A call to document.write() from an asynchronously-loaded external script was ignored.
Kuitana kwa documentwrite() kuchokera ku asynchronously-loaded external script kunanyozeredwa.
Add bookmarks to this folder to see them displayed on the Bookmarks Toolbar
Add bookmarks to this folder to see them displayed on the Bookmarks Toolbar
An unbalanced tree was written using document.write() causing data from the network to be reparsed. For more information https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Optimizing_Your_Pages_for_Speculative_Parsing

Mtengo wosalingana walembedwa pogwiritsa document.write() yomwe ikupangitsa data kuchokera ku dongosolo kusathamanga. Pofuna kudziwa zambiri https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Optimizing_Your_Pages_for_Speculative_Parsing
A script on this page has been stopped due to a low memory condition.
Zolemba pa tsamba ili zaima chifukwa cha kutsika kwa chikumbutso.
A script on this page may be busy, or it may have stopped responding. You can stop the script now, open the script in the debugger, or let the script continue.
Zolemba pa tsamba ili mwina zikhoza kukhala zotanganidwa, kapena zaima kuyankha. Mukhoza kusiya zolemba pompano, tsegulani zolemba mu debugger, kapena siyani zolemba zipitilire.
A script on this page may be busy, or it may have stopped responding. You can stop the script now, or you can continue to see if the script will complete.
zolemba pa tsamba ili mwina ndizotanganidwa,mwina zaima kuyankha. Mukhoza kusiya zolemba pompano, kapena mukhoza kupitiliza kuti muone ngati zolemba zingamalizike.
Attempt to load a javascript: URL from one host\nin a window displaying content from another host\nwas blocked by the security manager.
Kuyesa kupakira javascript URL kuchokera kwa mmodzi osamalira\nmu zenera lomwe landandalika zomwe zilipo kuchokera kwa osamalira wina\nzatchingidwa ndi bwana wa chitetezo.
{ -brand-short-name } is being updated by another instance

{ -brand-short-name } is designed by <label data-l10n-name="community-mozillaLink">{ -vendor-short-name }</label>, a <label data-l10n-name="community-creditsLink">global community</label> working together to keep the Web open, public and accessible to all.

{ -brand-short-name } inapangidwa ndi <label data-l10n-name="community-mozillaLink">{ -vendor-short-name }</label>, a<label data-l10n-name="community-creditsLink">madera a dziko lonse</label> kugwirila limodzi pakusunga Web yotsegula, kwa wina aliyense kugwiritsa ntchito.
{ -brand-short-name } is experimental and may be unstable.
canvas: an attempt to set strokeStyle or fillStyle to a value that is neither a string, a CanvasGradient, or a CanvasPattern was ignored.
nsali okhuthala: inayesa kulumikiza ku strokeStyle kapena fillStyle ku lemera kapena chingwe, kwa CanvasGradient, kapena kwa CanvasPattern inanyozeledwa.
Chingwe chopanda kanthu chinadutsa ku getElementById().
Firefox and the Firefox logos are trademarks of the Mozilla Foundation.
Firefox ndi Firefox zizindikiro zopangira malonda pa maziko a Mozilla.
Firefox and the Firefox logos are trademarks of the Mozilla Foundation.
Firefox ndi Firefox zizindikiro zopangira malonda pa maziko a Mozilla.
Firefox Start, a fast home page with built-in search
Firefox kuyamba, tsamba lofulumira pofufuza lopangidwiratu

<label data-l10n-name="community-exp-mozillaLink">{ -vendor-short-name }</label> is a <label data-l10n-name="community-exp-creditsLink">global community</label> working together to keep the Web open, public and accessible to all.

<label data-l10n-name="community-exp-mozillaLink">{ -vendor-short-name }</label> ndi ya <label data-l10n-name="community-exp-creditsLink">madera a dziko lonse</label> kugwirila limodzi pakusunga Web yotsegula, kwa wina aliyense kugwiritsa ntchito.
Please check this box if you want to proceed.
Chonde fufuzani bokosi ili ngati mukufuna kupitiliza.
Please select an item in the list.
Please select a valid value. The nearest valid value is %S.
Chonde sankhani mulingo ovomerezeka, Mulingo wapafupi ovomerezeka ndi %S.
Please select a valid value. The two nearest valid values are %S and %S.
Chonde sankhani mulingo ovomerezeka. Ziwiri zapafupi zovomomerezeka ndi izi %S ndi %S.
Please select a value that is no less than %S.
Chonde sankhani kufunikira komwe sikukutsikira kuposa %S.
Please select a value that is no more than %S.
Please select one of these options.
Chonde sankhani imodzi mwa zosankha izi.
Please select the home page you wish to use:
Chonde sankhani tsamba lanu, lomwe mufuna kugwiritsa ntchito:
Please shorten this text to %S characters or less (you are currently using %S characters).
Chonde fupikitsani lemba ili ku %S machitidwe mwina pang'ono (pakali pano mukugwiritsa %S machitidwe).
Request for fullscreen was denied because at least one of the document’s containing elements is not an iframe or does not have an “allowfullscreen” attribute.
Kupempha kwa ful-screen kunakanidwa chifukwa mwina kamodzi ka zolemba sikanali ndi "allowfullscreen'' attribute.
Robots have seen things you people wouldn’t believe.
Nyali za mu nseu zaona zinthu zomwe anthu simungakhulupilire.
Robots have shiny metal posteriors which should not be bitten.
Nyali za mu nseu ndi chitsuro chowala chomwe sichikuyenera kulumidwa.
Robots may not injure a human being or, through inaction, allow a human being to come to harm.
Nyali za mu nseu sizingaononge munthu, posagwira ntchito, lolani munthu adze kuononga.
Scripts may not close windows that were not opened by script.
Zolembedwa mwina sizingatseke mazenera omwe sanatsegulidwa ndi chilembo.
This page is asking you to confirm that you want to leave - data you have entered may not be saved.
Tsamba ili likufunsa kuti mutsimikize kuti mukufuna kusiya - data yomwe mwalowa mwina sisungidwa.
Updates disabled by your system administrator
Mauthenga atsopano sakutheka chifukwa cha ndondomeko ya mpangiri wanu
Use of attributes’ nodeValue attribute is deprecated. Use value instead.
Kugwiritsa ntchito attributes' nodeValue attribute yakaniza. Gwiritsani value mmalo mwake.
Use of attributes’ textContent attribute is deprecated. Use value instead.
Kugwiritsa nchito kwa attributes' textContent attribute yakaniza. Gwiritsani value mmalo mwake.
Use of document.createAttribute() is deprecated. Use element.setAttribute() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa document.createAttribute() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani mbali element.setAttribute() mmalo mwake.
Use of document.createAttributeNS() is deprecated. Use element.setAttributeNS() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa document.createAttribute() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani mbali element.setAttribute() mmalo mwake.
Use of enablePrivilege is deprecated. Please use code that runs with the system principal (e.g. an extension) instead.
Kugwiritsa ntchito kwa enablePrivilege yakaniza. Chonde gwiritsani code yomwe ikuyenda ndi ndondomeko (mwachitsanzo kuonjezera) mmalo mwake.
Use of getAttributeNode() is deprecated. Use getAttribute() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa getAttributeNode() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsa getAttribute() mmalo mwake.
Use of getAttributeNodeNS() is deprecated. Use getAttributeNS() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa getAttributeNodeNS() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani getAttributeNS() mmalo mwake.
Use of removeAttributeNode() is deprecated. Use removeAttribute() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa removeAttributeNode() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani removeAttribute() mmalo mwake.
Use of setAttributeNode() is deprecated. Use setAttribute() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa setAttributeNode() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani setAttribute() mmalo mwake.
Use of setAttributeNodeNS() is deprecated. Use setAttributeNS() instead.
Kugwiritsa kwa setAttributeNodeNS() kwa kanizidwa. Gwiritsani setAttributeNS() mmalo mwake.
Want to help? <label data-l10n-name="helpus-donateLink">Make a donation</label> or <label data-l10n-name="helpus-getInvolvedLink">get involved!</label>
We have come to visit you in peace and with goodwill!
You are currently not in a private window.
Pakali pano simuli pa zenera la chinsinsi.
You can not perform further updates on this system. <label data-l10n-name="unsupported-link">Learn more</label>
Simungathe kupangabe zobwera kumene pa ndondomeko iyi. <label data-l10n-name="unsupported-link">Phunzirani zambiri</label>
